name: Error - The Game
description:
Some older PC's may lag in the Web Version if you experience this lag there is also a Desktop Version without these issues.

You are Vibe-Rus a malware, you have one goal collecting code fragments to corrupt the world’s computer terminals! 

But watch out for firewalls and the Terminals users who will try to delete you! 

Stop them by avoiding fire and using your mouse at home to keep their cursor away from you!

In the Web version, remember your mouse will only control the cursor while it's in the game window, to avoid this problem you can download and play the Desktop Version!
